Hi Umer, where are you currently studying?

I haven't heard much about NE research in France.  However, I did find
a paper written at a French univeristy that reviews some NE research
including NEAT.  The paper is written in French.  It is credited to:

Stephane Doncieux
Universite Pierre et Marie Curie
LIP6 - AnimatLab
E-mail: Stephane.Doncieux@...

Here is a link to the paper:

http://www.ensica.fr/microdrone/Actes/Contributions/S2_A_DONCIEUX.PDF

Perhps if you contact the author (email listed above) he can tell you
about NE in France, or where the right places to study that kind of
thing would be.

ken

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Umer Iqbal" <umer@t...> wrote:
> 
> Does anyone know of any similar/related research going on in France?
> (Anything to do with NeuroEvolution?)
> 
> Regards,
> Umer..
